name: Football Prediction
description: The Football Prediction API provides predictions for upcoming football matches, average bookie odds, results for past matches and prediction performance statistics for past results.

api_methods.name: Head To Head
api_methods.description: Shows head to head stats and previous encounters for the home and away team of an upcoming match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the search to only X previous encounters. (max is 10)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the head-to-head stats for the match with ID 81930?
What are the previous encounters between the teams in match 81930?
I need the head-to-head details for the game with ID 81930.
Could you provide the historical stats for match 81930?
Show me the head-to-head record for the teams in match 81930.
What’s the history between the teams in game 81930?
Give me the head-to-head data for match 81930.
Can you display the previous encounters for the teams in match 81930?
I’d like to see the head-to-head stats for match 81930.
What’s the head-to-head performance for the teams in game 81930?

api_methods.name: Home Team League Stats
api_methods.description: Shows the league table and stats for the home team of an upcoming match.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the league table and stats for the home team of the match with ID 81930?

What’s the league performance of the home team in the match identified by 81930?
Can you fetch the league table and stats for the home team of match ID 81930?
I’d like to see the league stats for the home team in the match with ID 81930.
Provide the league table and statistics for the home team of match 81930.
What does the league table look like for the home team in match ID 81930?

api_methods.description: Grab the statistics and list of the last 10 matches played by the home team for a certain ID

parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

api_methods.name: Prediction Details
api_methods.description: Grab all available predictions for a match id

api_methods.name: List available federations
api_methods.description: Returns an array of all the available federations.

api_methods.name: Performance stats for past predictions
api_methods.description: Returns information about the accuracy of past predictions. (in the last day, 7 days, 14 days and 30 days) Can be additionally filtered by federation and market. If no market filter is provided it defaults to classic

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Show stats for a different prediction market. Defaults to "classic" if not provided

utterances.utterance: How accurate were the football predictions in the last 7 days?

What’s the accuracy of predictions in the last 7 days for the African football federation?

How accurate were the predictions for the CONCACAF federation in the last 14 days?
Show me the prediction performance stats for the last day in the premium market.
What’s the accuracy of football predictions in the last 7 days for the UEFA federation in the classic market?

api_methods.name: Get list of fixture IDs
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of fixture IDs that can be used to make requests to endpoints expecting a ID url parameter.
Can be filtered by:

- iso_date
- market
- federation

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the fixture IDs for today's matches?
